title: Artery Forceps
full: Used to clamp blood vessels and control bleeding during surgical procedures.

title: Needle Holder
full: Used to hold and drive suture needles while suturing tissue.

title: Scalpel Handle
full: Used to hold surgical blades for making precise surgical incisions.

title: Bone Holding Forceps
full: Used to grasp and stabilize bone fragments during orthopedic surgery.

title: Surgical Retractor
full: Used to hold back tissue and improve visibility in the surgical field.
